description:
Our Medical English course is geared towards health care professionals and those who want to learn this specific jargon.

In this course we will discuss anatomy, illnesses and medical equipment.

The course consists of several classes all in English and with visual aids.

Our Medical English course lasts approximately 45 minutes and once completed you should have learned key medical jargon and concepts.

You should start this course if you want to learn healthcare related jargon or simply widen your vocabulary.

At the end of this course you will be able to discuss healthcare related topics, have a better understanding of human anathomy, know the most common illnesses and the names of the professionals involved in the sector.
title: Learn Medical English with an easy and clear
